item.name: RDS::BinLogDiskUsage
item.description: The amount of disk space occupied by binary logs on the master. Applies to MySQL read replicas.

item.name: RDS::CPUCreditUsage
item.description: The number of CPU credits consumed by the instance.

item.name: RDS::CPUCreditBalance
item.description: The number of CPU credits available for the instance to burst beyond its base CPU utilization.

item.name: RDS::DatabaseConnections
item.description: The number of database connections in use.

item.name: RDS::DiskQueueDepth
item.description: The number of outstanding IOs (read/write requests) waiting to access the disk.

item.name: RDS::FreeableMemory
item.description: The amount of available random access memory.

item.name: RDS::FreeStorageSpace
item.description: The amount of available storage space.

item.name: RDS::NetworkReceiveThroughput
item.description: The incoming (Receive) network traffic on the DB instance, including both customer database traffic and Amazon RDS traffic used for monitoring and replication.

item.name: RDS::NetworkTransmitThroughput
item.description: The outgoing (Transmit) network traffic on the DB instance, including both customer database traffic and Amazon RDS traffic used for monitoring and replication.

item.name: RDS::ReadIOPS
item.description: The average number of disk I/O operations per second.

item.name: RDS::ReadLatency
item.description: The average amount of time taken per disk I/O operation.

item.name: RDS::ReadThroughput
item.description: The average number of bytes read from disk per second.

item.name: RDS::ReplicaLag
item.description:
The amount of time a Read Replica DB Instance lags behind the source DB Instance. Applies to MySQL read replicas.
The ReplicaLag metric reports the value of the Seconds_Behind_Master field of the MySQL SHOW SLAVE STATUS command.

item.name: RDS::SwapUsage
item.description: The amount of swap space used on the DB Instance.

item.name: RDS::WriteIOPS
item.description: The average number of disk I/O operations per second.

item.name: RDS::WriteLatency
item.description: The average amount of time taken per disk I/O operation.

item.name: RDS::WriteThroughput
item.description: The average number of bytes written to disk per second.
